ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of COLIN DODDS of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2015, in the place of William A. Black.
